details.access_and_opening_times:
Opening hours

  • Monday to Thursday, 8:30am to 5pm
  • Friday, 8:30am to 1:30pm

We are not open on Saturdays and Sundays. Please note, time in Kosovo is GMT+1 during the winter (end of October till end of March) and GMT+2 during the summer (end of March till end of October).

Disabled access

Customers with disabilities should contact the Embassy in advance to discuss their requirements so we can ensure they have full access to our services. The number to ring is +381 (38) 254 700.

2015 public holidays

The British Embassy Pristina will be closed on the following public holidays.

  • Thursday 01 January
  • Wednesday 07 January
  • Tuesday 17 February
  • Friday 03 April
  • Monday 06 April
  • Thursday 09 April
  • Monday 04 May
  • Monday 25 May
  • Friday 17 July
  • Monday 31 August
  • Thursday 24 September
  • Thursday 24 December
  • Friday 25 December
  • Monday 28 December
